title: Tidal Latency
desc:
With the Tidal Latency visualization, users view an interactive map highlighting the canals in order to track the latency of tides in Venice. Users can step through or play a simulation of the tides, which shows how the tides in any location in Venice compare to those at Punta Salute, a major Venetian landmark.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
